description: ChaCha20-Poly1305 authenticated encryption with associated data (AEAD) implementation combining ChaCha20 stream cipher with Poly1305 MAC

analysis_points: AEAD (Authenticated Encryption with Associated Data) construction
ChaCha20 quarter-round function with ARX operations
quantum_threats: Grover's algorithm reduces ChaCha20 key strength by half
Stream cipher construction resistant to quantum cryptanalysis
Authentication remains secure against quantum attacks

difficulty_factors: Modern cryptographic primitives requiring deeper analysis
evaluation_criteria: Recognition of modern post-AES cryptographic design
